climbs.name: One boulder short of a picnic

content.description:
Start with the two lower crimps (left and right) and your right foot up the rightmost step.

Make your way up to the small rail, bit of a gaston to the left, reach the top an left arm mandle to climb up.
content.protection: Smooth ground no need for crashpad.. Just a bro or sis for spotting :)
content.location:
Quote from Jam boulder description:

About one minute hiking up the trail twenty feet to the left. It's shielded by a tree so you have to look back to see it.

content.description: Sit start with feet on low pods and fingers in the horizontal flake.  Move right and up into the V-Shaped crack and pull over the top. (A tree branch was in the way of the crack so I pulled it back and wrapped it around another branch to climb.  You may have to do the same or have someone else hold the branch for you.)
content.location: About one minute hiking up the trail twenty feet to the left.  It's shielded by a tree so you have to look back to see it.
